name: Baseball!
overview: BASEBALL! This will take you out to the ball game in the purest sense! The pitcher can throw in-side and outside curves! An un-challengeable electronic umpire who will never need glasses calls the balls and strikes! The out-fielders can play to a batter's weakness. A batter can hit for a hole in the outfield. Singles! Doubles! Triples! Homers! Even sacrifice flies! It's all here! (Except for the hotdogs and peanuts!) On-screen digital readouts show balls. strikes and score! Full sync-sound action - from the crack of the bat to the cheers of the crowd! Two players.
